full_description: Click the <bell's top center> on the table to create an CQ Morse code signal(hello, can you here me?).
schema: {A} notifies the bell, {a} notifies the arm to click the bell to produce an CQ signal.
preference: Number of words should not exceed 15.
seen: Press <bell's top center> using {a} on the table to signal CQ.
Instruct {a} to press <bell's top center> in CQ pattern.
Push <bell's top center> on the table, signaling CQ.
